mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_article (event_article_num, subject, textcontent, eventtype, thumbnail, startdate, enddate, created) VALUES (SEQ_EVENT_ARTICLE.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{textcontent}, #{eventType}, #{thumbnail}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, SYSDATE )

insert.if: INSERT INTO coupon (coupon_code, couponname, valid, rate, couponstart, expiredate, event_article_num) VALUES (#{coupon_code}, #{couponname}, #{valid}, #{rate}, #{couponstart}, #{expiredate},SEQ_EVENT_ARTICLE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO clockin_event (clockin_num, daybyday, weekly, monthly, event_article_num) VALUES (SEQ_CLOCKIN_EVENT.NEXTVAL, #{daybyday}, #{weekly}, #{monthly}, SEQ_EVENT_ARTICLE.CURRVAL)

mapper.select: SELECT event_article_num , subject, textcontent, eventtype, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate , TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, created FROM event_article WHERE SYSDATE > ENDDATE OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ea.event_article_num, subject, textcontent, eventtype, thumbnail, TO_CHAR(startdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate ,TO_CHAR(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created,
coupon_code, couponname, valid, rate
clockin_num, daybyday, weekly, monthly
NVL(commcount, 0) commcount
FROM event_article ea
JOIN coupon c ON c.event_article_num = ea.event_article_num
JOIN clockin_event ce ON ce.event_article_num = ea.event_article_num
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) commcount, evt_num FROM event_comm WHERE evt_num = #{num} GROUP BY evt_num ) ecom ON ecom.evt_num = ea.event_article_num
WHERE ea.event_article_num = #{num}
SELECT ga.memberidx, nickname, email FROM event_gacha ga JOIN member m ON m.memberidx = ga.memberidx WHERE evt_num = #{num}
